div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 36px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 30px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 188px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - tests his phone book against the Bloom filter, and creates a list of possibly common contacts

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 193px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - retrieves public key flashes for the phone numbers from internal DB

switch.text: - retrieves public key flashes for the phone numbers from internal DB

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
List of public key flashes
(includes phone_number, timestamp, sign(hash(public_key, timestamp, phone_number)))
where the signing is by the private_key corresponding to the included public_key

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 168px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - refreshes the timestamps for the known public keys in his internal DB

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 208px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - creates a Bloom filter containing the phone number of each of her contacts she gossips with
